marytts.signalproc.adaptation
Class BaselineAdaptationItem

java.lang.Object
  marytts.signalproc.adaptation.BaselineAdaptationItem

public class BaselineAdaptationItem
extends java.lang.Object

This class keeps information on each specific training item For example, a training item for a sentence based voice conversion training database could be a wav file, the corresponding text transcription, label file, pitch contour file, etc. The training set is a collection of BaseTrainingItem objects

Author:
Oytun Türk
